Project Overview
================

Project Goal
------------
Goal - Creating an interactive learning management system that's simple and can be accessed from browser or mobile devices. 

The web app that produced still require a lot of improvement. But based on the the feedback and survey that was done to the students, 80% prefer using IPC instead of blackboard.


Project Description
-------------------
Student engagement play a big role in student achievemtn in learning institution. Based on research, student that have a higher student engagement will achieve a higher achievement compared to those who have low student engagement. IPC is created to improve the student engagement of student and lecturer outside the class by using technology. Therefore the learning environment is not limited to classroom.
